message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take a slightly bigger share this time, but I'm sure you'll get a better deal later on.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but I'm confident I can make a more equitable deal this round. Let's reverse our positions from last time.
Bob, let's split this evenly. We've both had our chances to propose, and I think this is the fairest way to divide the money. We can't afford to keep arguing, the value is dropping quickly!
